values:
Wow, hey everyone! Or whoever is reading this. It's been a wicked long time since I posted on live journal. Hm, what's been going on? Well, I'm not in school at the moment. I am looking for a job. But I do babysit here in Rhode Island. (if anyone needs a babysitter).

I'm getting a huge tax return from federal and state, so all of it's going into the bank. I was suppose to move back to Chicago in October, but that failed. Oh, I forgot to mention that I spent some time in the windy city over the summer. It was fun. Though I didn't get a chance to chill with Ursla or Eli. I was suppose to when I moved back in Oct., but hopefully another time.

Truthfully, I miss that city, but I don't miss one of the people there. Hm...When I do go back to Chi...there's Eli, Tara, Ursla, Sydney, Julia, and a bunch more I know/gonna chill with. I'm looking forward to going again this summer. w00t w00t!

I also wanna make plans to go to Washington D.C to visit another old friend and his partner. Argh, so many plans but so little cash. So if anyone knows of a job that I could get, that would be FABULOUS! 

What else is going on? Hm, my bffl is getting married this May on the 23rd. Wicked nervous about it. We've been friends our whole lives. It's almost like my little sister is getting married. EEEEP! I should ask my girfriend(yes, I also have a girlfriend) if she wants to go with me.

Hm, nothing much else is going on. I'm almost 20. My teen years are on the countdown!! 

Anyway, I'll try to log back on again soon enough. I need to change my profile picture. Look me up on facebook!

Hey everyone! What's up? It's been crazy for me lately. I currently don't have a job but hopefully that'll change very soon. I was making plans with a "friend" of mine about moving up to Chicago and living and working up there then come back in Jan. But nope! This person said that they didn't want me as a roommate.

So, if you live up in Chicago and want a roommate, lemme know please! Or up in Boston, Mass or surrounding areas. ((PLEASE! I really need to get out of Rhode Island.)

But anyway, what else is going on? Hmm, I'm going by male pronouns now and I have a "girlfriend" in a sense. I guess. Not sure what we are at the moment.

That's basically my life at the moment. Besides fighting with my ma, there isn't much more. I know, my life is rather boring and I don't like.

Save my boring life!

I feel like it's been forever since I've posted. But I'm back. Loads have happened in the past few months. Right now I am way to tired to go into that many details.

Lay down;

1) I started dating a best friend of mine; we broke up; we're no longer friends.

2) I'm starting CCRI this Fall...I think...?

3) I started talking to another ex of mine. Which is good.

4) I just got home from a short visit to Chicago. Ran into a few people I know. Got a tattoo.

Hey everyone! Long time no talk.

I just celebrated my 19th birthday last Wednesday and let's just say I had a day that would make any Gemini happy!

Quick low down;

1) Started out great, got $$ from my mom and a tie from my bffl.


2) Got out of school early and picked up my pay check. Which is good because the night before I only had 10 cents to my name.


3) Went to YPI and had a bunch of people wish my a happy birthday. Got attacked by my mentor.


4) Fought with my mother.


5) Hung out with two of my best friends and some random kid.


6) Got into a major fight with one of my bffls that I'm dating about commitment.


7) Basically smoked half a pack of cigs from stress.


8) Went home and hung out with a few other friends.


9) Had a few drinks and cake.


10) Well, I won't say the next thing that happened. Let's just say I had GREAT theopy.



So yeah. A mixture of Dark and Light.

A true Gemini I am!

My 105 Truths:

time started:10:35

1. real name - Sam
2. single or taken - Single and HAPPY!
3. like anyone - No.
4. zodiac sign - Gemini
5. male or female - Genderqueer.
6. elementary school- I went to a few.
7. middle school- Riverside Middle School.
8. high school: East Providence Senior High.
9. eye color - Brown.
10. hair color - Dark brown.
11. favorite number- 2.
12. favorite sport - playing? Baseball - GO RED SOX
13. favorite drink - Tea.
14. favorite song - Hrm....I like a lot of songs.
15. are you a health freak - Not really.
16. height - 5'6
17. do you have a crush on someone?: Nope.
18. do you like yourself? I adore myself.
19. piercings- Ears, nose, lip.
20. tattoos - Boston B.
21. righty or lefty - Righty.

FIRSTS-
22. first surgery - My upper lip.
23. first piercings- Earlopes.
24. first best friend/friends- Kar an Jaime.
25. first award - Reading Award.
26. first sport - Tag.
27. first pet - Cat.
28. first vacation - Virginia and Washington D.C a few years ago.
29. first teacher- No idea.

LASTS-

39. last vacation - Last summer - San Francisco.
40. last fight - Yesterday with my mom.

42. last car ride -Sunday with Nikki.
43. last thing you bought- A lighter.
44. last thing you ate? Noodles.
45. last thing you drank- Tea.
46. last on your top friends- Forgot.

CURRENTLY-
49. eating - Nothing.

54. wearing - Boxers.

FUTURE-
55. want kids- Maybe.
56. want to get married - Maybe. If I find "the one."
57. where do you want to live? - Boston, Massachusetts.
58. Where do you want to go to college? Hmmm....URI or BU.
60. how many kids? Maybe two.
61. still talk to parents? Not really.
62. want to be rich? - I don't want to be poor.
63. want to be famous? - Not really. Unless I'm dating k.d lang.

65. What about underground living? Not for me.
66. kids names- Xander, Edan, Xavier, Katherine, Dawn, Fenway.

WHICH IS BETTER WITH THE SAME SEX-
68. lips or eyes - Both.
69. hugs or kisses - Both.
70. shorter or taller - Taller.
71. tan skinned or light- Either or.

74. muscular or normal - Normal.
75. hook ups or relationship - Depends on the sit.
76. similar to you or different - I want someone to have some interests as me. But have their own personality.

HAVE YOU EVER-

79. got drunk - HELL YEAH.
80. broken a bone - Nope.
82. broken someones heart - Yep.
83. turned someone on - Haha, yep!
84. done drugs - Nope.
85. liked a friend as more than a friend - *sigh* Shut up.

DO YOU BELIEVE IN-
86. yourself - Yep.
87. miracles - Jah. Have you meet me? It's mircale I'm still alive.
88. Easter Bunny - Crack Baby.
89. Santa Claus - Hate that guy. I'm still waiting for my Tonka trucks!
90. Sex on the first date - Depends.
91. angels - I believe in Gaurdian Angels.

ANSWER TRUTHFULLY-
92. Is there one or more person you want to be with right now? ...........
93. Are you on Myspace a lot? Nope.
94. Are you cool? Like ice.

LASTS-
95. Text message - James.
96. Recieved call - Mom.
97. Call made - Stump.
98. Comment on myspace- Some girl name Jess.
99. Missed Call - Mom.
100. Person you hung out with - James.
101. You hugged - Mark.
103. You IMed - Kris.
104. You slapped - James.
105. Time finished- 10:42

This past week, I had school vocation and spent whatever free time I had between work, volunteering, and avoiding home reading the Harry Potter series. I'm only half way through the second book. I know, I'm going so slow with it. But thankfully, I have tomorrow off of work and most likely I'll be spending it reading. Before or after I get under my tongue pierced.

But anyway, peace y'all. I'm going to read. \m/

So, on Friday I went to Boston for a few hours to relieve some of my stress levels. It helped somewhat.

I'm not going to list my whole life story to you. That's idiotic. Here's a basic lay down.

1) I've been called "Sir" so many times, I've lost count. Even at work.

2) When I was in Boston, I used the men's room because it felt right to me. I didn't get attacked and (hopefully) no one noticed that I'm a bio-female.

3) I had the chance to talk to a really great friend of mine. Missed him loads.

4) Couldn't find MTPC for the life of me.

5) Funny story: My ex has a new gf barely 2 months after we broke up and has completely fallen in love with her. (Jaime's on the phone: "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" in a crazy Dominican way.). I agree with him.

But anyway, to end this painful blog quickly, one last word of wisdom: People are psycho if they tell you they love you after one week. Run...away...NOW.

Now that the warmer weather is finally here in New England, minus the still chilly nights, I've been thinking of getting the inner tubes of my tires fixed on my bike so I can go riding more often. 

Even though I'm planning on getting a car soon, I would much rather be riding my bike and taking public transportation (which I do more than anything else in the fucking world!). But anyway, it's getting late.

P.S There is no private shit!

Hey everyone! I'm relaxing at the youth org. I volunteer at and decided to post an entry. I'm sitting in my mentor's Captain's chair listening to 80s music. I'm kinda pumped. It's Friday afternoon and I don't have to be at Shaw's AND I finished all my volunteer work. GO ME!

Tonight I'm going to see a play with Youth Pride, Inc. YPI is Rhode Island's state wide drop in center for Lesbian, Gay Bisexual, Transgender, Queer, and Questioning youth and young adults ages 13 to 23. It's a fun place to be when you're not trying to slap customers in the face for being idiots or working 6 or 7 hour shifts just in general.

Moving on though, I got my lip done on Wednesday. I'll post pictures soon. I know you'll like it my fellow cheese-whizzes.

Logging off the Captain's Chair, ttyl!

((I feel both sassy and dorky today)).

Okay, so it's been awhile since I last posted. Since 1773 or whenever I posted last, here is what's going down in my life real quick.

1) I spent a weekend in Boston, Mass and saw k.d lang. She shook my hand! ::melts::
2) I ended up breaking up with my girlfriend, much to my relief.
3) I got sick. I was on four different medications. 1 nasal spray and 3 orally. Now I'm down to the nasal spray and 2 other pills.
4) I got a tattoo of the Boston Red Sox "B"
5) I got into college, I'm starting next fall at the Community College of Rhode Island. Gonna be a social worker!
6) March 26th is payday and I'm going to get a new piericing. Possibly my lip. No idea yet.
7) My ma and I have been fighting on and off. But that's nothing new.
8) I have a new laptop.

A lot of things are going up and down right now. But cheer up, baseball season has started and Sweeney Todd is coming out on DVD on April 1st. No, it's no April Fools. 

Oh, and one more thing. 

Bonus: I'M GAY!

So, things have been crazy lately. On Friday I went to New Urban Arts in Providence, RI. Luckily, my ex wasn't there. Ha! Sad thing is, I haven't stopped thinking about her since my friend brought up a myspace profile that had a cello playing earlier this week. 

I never really cried after we broke up. It's been 8 months since we broke up and I've only seen her like...3 or 4 times. This coming Friday is an art show at NUA, I want to go, but what if she's there? 

Oh well, I shouldn't let a stupid ex effect where I go and have fun.

So, it's been an execllent start to the new year. Kinda. First week of the year I'm working 20 hours, 5 of em are time and a 1/5. Which is GOOOOOOD. Bad news, I have a 5 1/2 page paper due this Friday. Anyway wanna do it for me? I know you wanna! PLZ?
So, it's been a bad year. Horrible really. Loads of shit happened and well...let's hope it doesn't drag on into the new year. I NEED GOOOOOD LUCK PEOPLE. GOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOD LUCK!

So, another year, another Christmas, another...well...::cough:: Family shit. My ma and I got into a fight. Blah blah. Usual shyt. But it all ended well. I got new socks, everyone needs need clean white socks and new clean toe socks. I basically got a few things I needed and a few I didn't.

Needed:
1) Socks!!!!!!!!
2) Alarm Clock
3) New quilt.
4) Phone case
5) Boston Red Sox shirts.
6) Sweeney Todd soundtrack.
7) Pillows
8) Gift cards
9) Boots and sneakers.

Wanted:
1) Buddha statues
2) Hand lotion. My hands get really dry in the winter. They turn a little grey. Like bad meat. Yum.
3) Chilled with Kar and Mandi for a lil bit.

1) Janurary - the beginning of the first full year of not having my family with me. 

2) Feburary - Valentines Day passes, my gf and I are going through a fight. 

3) March - My mom and I have a fight, I get kicked out. I also found out that I wasn't going to be graduating because they screwed over my credits. 

4) April - I'm aloud to live at home again - but I had to start paying 30 dollars a month - Thing is....I had no job. 

5) May - I turn 18, my gf and I break up...the day after my 18th birthday. 

6) June - I start smoking and drinking (more) due to stress. I was deemed a "slut" by a friend. I swear, it was only three people! 

7) July - My drinking gets worse. I went from smoking a pack a week to a pack every three days. 

8) August - I start Girl Scout camp. I'm still an "alcoholic." 

9) September - I start classes again. I see my ex, it gets awkward. But my drinking went down and I got a job. 

10) October - Winter is on it's way and already I'm starting to feel the holiday blues. 

11) November - I spent Thanksgiving with my mom's drunken/high friends. 

12) December - Christmas is on it's way. It'll be my second one without my family. Today, the 8th, my little boy. My tortoise...my love...my Aleksandr the Gr8...dies.

So, thankfully Thanksgiving is over. I don't think I could've handled another moment of my parental unit and her drunk/high buddies and their homophobic lango. I ended up spending most of Thanksgiving in bed...sick. No, I really am sick. I got a cough. SHUT UP!

But I did go to Boston on Friday after spending an hour or so with my mentor Stump and her three CRAZY dogs; George, Fin (she's lazy! Poor thing wanted to go home after 10 minutes), and then the puppy puppy Imani (whom is turning 1 in Jan and as CRAZY as George!)!

Anyway, now I just have to wait for Christmas to come and go. I just might buy myself a pack of smokes and got lost in Boston for a day. Kinda hard really. I always seem to find my way back to Common Park. Anyone know where I could get lost for awhile? Not for long...just for a few hours.

Gender Roles, GO F*CK YOURSELVES!

So, for those of you who don't know, I'm a bit...well..an extreme gender bending rebel anti two gender kinda birl (a mixture of boy and girl. Genius, isn't it? I didn't come up with the name, but I like it...A LOT).

But anyway, I'm getting really tired of this two-gendered society. I'm going to fight it. I'm going to fight it hard. Like...when your mother fought really hard not to slap herself when you were born. (btw, if you haven't caught on, I'm being sarcastic).

I'm sick, sick, SICK, of having to explain to people that I'm gender bending, hell, sometimes I don't even believe in gender. Often at work I'm mistaken for a guy, I can't see why. ::rolls eyes::

Why do we have to follow society's rules of what a man is and what a woman is? Is it because humans like everything to have only one def? It's fucked up. I'm saying farewell to the female gender AND the male gender. Have fun with it children, really, do have fun.

Remember, if that little "boy" wants to play with Barbie, DAMNIT, buy "him" a doll house to go with it. If that little "girl" wants to play with a tonka truck, DAMNIT, buy "her" a sand box to go with it.

Hey everyone! It's time for an update.

So, this past Halloween I had to work a 6 hour shift at Shaws and I didn't get home till a little after 9. Already my Halloween had started off bad (not only that, but I also had to go to class that day). But anyway, after I got home from working at FABULOUS Shaws (rolls eyes), I put on a fire hair looking wig and headed out to my friends. I have to say, I think that was the highlight of our Halloween. Just us being together. Because after that, my bffl "J" got a raw egg thrown at her and my bffl "C" got called a fag because he dressed as a woman.

And we didn't get that much candy either! ::sob:: That's okay. I bought a 3 pound bag for less then 3 bucks at Shaws. W00T.

Now and forever
Until the time is through

I cant believe it
I dont know where to start no baby
So many questions
Deep inside my heart

Bridge:
Give me a moment before you go
Theres something you ought to know

Chorus:
Baby now and forever
Until the time is through
Ill be standing here
Waiting and never give up my faith in you
Trying to make it clear
Without your love Id be half a man
Maybe one day youll understand
Now and forever
Until the time is through

Ill be waiting...

How can I tell you so that you can see
Love has a meaning
When you are here with me
(when you are here with me, baby)

(bridge)

(chorus)

There is no one to comfort me
Here in my cold reality
Im searching for words
What can I say to make you see? 

Baby now, until time is through, Ill be here girl (2x)

(chorus)

So, it's been over a week...hasn't it? Things have been fabulous for the past week. My girlfriend was down from Chicago. It's been one of the best weeks of my life so far. Her bus back to Chicago was at 11:45p est and my last bus home was at 10:53p est. 

I must say, the departure was heart breaking. I felt really guilty about leaving her in Kennedy Plaza (KP) by herself crying because she didn't want to leave. She's coming back on Oct. 16th and I can't fucking wait! It pisses me off that I couldn't hold her till she stopped crying.

So yeah, it's been awhile since I last posted. Like..5 days peeps! Things are going crazy. I'm working my ass off at both school and at work while trying to finish cleaning my apt for when my girl comes down to RI from Chicago. Everything seems really off-balance..just...crazy ya know? During my breaks at Shaws (which is onlt 15/20 minutes) I've been sitting outside eating a milk chocolate Hershey bars and a bottle of Coke while takinga  drag of a smoke...or two or three. Depending on how fast I smoke em... Mah Nat (which is weird, because I work with a Natalie also) doesn't like me eating unhealthy during my break. So, while she's down here and I'm at work, during my break she's gonna break me real food (I'm still gunna eat a candy bar and have a soda. Because I'm mad dope like that)....so yeah...I'M A COKE ADDICT.

So, again I'm babysitting for 4 hrs and 45 minutes. Todays pretty mellow. No glitter. But the toddler got poop all over the fucking toilet seat. Oh...my...GAY...it smelled REALLLY BAD. Like something died in him. Gr. >< I didn't die. Don't worry! I liiiive! I love  these boys. ^>^

• So, things are getting a little crazy as I go about my life. My mom and I are being bitches to one another. She broke her little toe the other day and I laughed. Why? Idno why. I just found it funny. She whacked me with one of her crotches. Now I have a big ass bruise on my left arm. 

    Things with my friend "Kitten" is getting strange. Her "Puppy" is going off to Iraq soon and I can tell that it's getting her up inside. I've never known someone personally that was going over to the war. 
     
    Argh. Life is strange I say. STRANGE.

Just one more day holding your hand tightly will make me the happiest woman alive. 
To once more hold you close and remember the smell of your hair.
Baby, if I could have one more day in your arms, I'd be the happiest woman alive.

Baby...I want need you.


I walk along the city streets you used to walk along with me,
and every step I take reminds me of just how we used to be.
Well, how can I forget you, girl?
When there is always something there to remind me.
always something there to remind me.
As shadows fall, I pass a small cafe where we would dance at night.
And I can't help recalling how it how it felt to kiss and hold you tight
Well, how can I forget you, girl?
When there is always something there to remind me.
always something there to remind me.
I was born to love her, and I'll never be free.
You'll always be a part of me.

If you should find you miss the sweet and tender love we used to share.
Just go back to the places where we used to go, and I'll be there

always something there to remind me.

Aha, another day and another entry! Lucky b_tches! So, I'm lounging around being a lazy ass listening to "Sleeping Beauty" by A Perfect Circle..And as I sit here listening to it, I've come to realize that I truely am the biggest dork ever. Aside from my Brain Eater Danny and Str8 Monkey Dan (there's also a Yankee Monkey Jill and a Red Sox Monkey Jamie. I adore Jill cuz she's HOT but she's a Yankee's fan. Damn). Haha. I know, my friends have weird names. STFU!

So, as the song changes to "Phantom of the Opera" I sit here pondering what I'm doing with my life. I'm finishing up schooling this next June then going off to college. VERY EXICTING I MUST SAY. Though I'm a little troubled. Should I go to college in Boston or go to college here in Providence?

Where is my life going? I'm a jobless (well, till Tuesday) punk who has no idea what to do in life. I know I want to work with people. Like...sex crime victims and working with low-income/crime affected families. But....I don't know anymore. Some days I just want to go back to the old ways. Hanging out in downtown Bos with friends and complaining about how much the government sucks while drinking a cold beer and having a smoke.

I still do it sometimes....but it's starting to lose it's feel. It's like I'm growing up or something. I don't wanna grow up. But I suppose it's just part of life.
So, yeah....I got a new MP3 playa. I have both my k.d lang cds on here. Along with the Ramones, Gigi, and a few other random songs. IT'S AMAZING.

ULTIMATE LESBIAN "QUEER-ED UP" SURVEY:

1. Are you sure of your sexual orientation? Or are you confused?:
Pretty positive.

2. Are you open with your sexuality? Or is it a secret?:
You clearly haven't meet me.

3. Who was the 1st person you told that you're a lesbian?
Myself.

4. Is your hair short, medium, or long?
Short. Should get a trim.

5. Would you ever shave your head?
Already have a few times.

6. Do you own anything with the Gay Rainbow on it?:
Quite a few things.

7. Do you consider yourself a Stud, Androgynous, or Femme?:
Andro Stud

8. What type of females are you most attracted to?:
Usually butches.

9. What FAMOUS Lesbian is your favorite?
Tie between Ellen DeGenerous and k.d lang.

10. Do you like watching The L Word?:
Sometimes.

11. What is your favorite lesbian movie?:
"Fire" It takes place in India.

12. Do you have any Pride tattoo's?, if not, would you ever get one?
I wanna get a few.

13. Do you go to Gay/Lesbian clubs?:
Yes.

14. Would you ever be a Drag King? (If you're not already):
On occasion.

15. What name would you go by if you did do Drag?:
Cody .............

16. Have you ever been mistaken assumed to be for a Male?:
All the fucking time.

17. Would you ever have a sex change to become a Male?:
No, thanks.

18. How do you feel about Homophobia?:
It's asking me how do I feel about racism.  It's stupid and pointless and mostly republicans do it.

19. How do you feel about Gays/Lesbians having children?:
 Why not? 

20. If it were legal, would you marry another Female?:
Of course.

21. What FAMOUS lesbian singer do you like the most?:
k.d lang

22. Have you ever attended a Gay Pride Festival?:
Of course.

23. Do you wear make-up?:
No

24. Do you carry a wallet?, or a purse?:
Wallet

25. Do you wear Male clothes?:
All of my clothes are "male"

26. Do you prefer wearing cologne instead of perfume?:
Cologne.  Axe and Tag.

27. Do you have several piercings & tattoo's?:
3 on my right ear and 1 on my left in the piercing department.

28. Do you have a crush on a female celebrity, if so, who?:
k.d lang

29. How did your parents handle you telling them about your orientation?:
My mom is really supportive.

30. Do you have more Gay/Lesbian/Bi friends than you do Straight friends?:
Yes.

31. Have you ever been gay bashed?:
Physically and Emotionally

32. Did anyone stop having contact with you after you came out of the closet?:
Yep..

33. What is your favorite gay/lesbian quote?: Straight Americans need... an education of the heart and soul.  They must understand - to begin with - how it can feel to spend years denying your own deepest truths, to sit silently through classes, meals, and church services while people you love toss off remarks that brutalize your soul.  ~Bruce Bawer, The Advocate, 28 April 1998

I get sick of listening to straight people complain about, "Well, hey, we don't have a heterosexual-pride day, why do you need a gay-pride day?"  I remember when I was a kid I'd always ask my mom:  "Why don't we have a Kid's Day?  We have a Mother's Day and a Father's Day, but why don't we have a Kid's Day?"  My mom would always say, "Every day is Kid's Day."  To all those heterosexuals that bitch about gay pride, I say the same thing:  Every day is heterosexual-pride day!  Can't you people enjoy your banquet and not piss on those of us enjoying our crumbs over here in the corner?  ~Rob Nash

34. Do you believe you were born a lesbian?:
I believe so.

35. Are you proud? Or ashamed of your sexuality?:
Proud as hell.

So, I spent most of my waking hours with my friends Kari and Col at the Providence Place Mall. I'm quite happy to say that I got myself another k.d lang cd (listening to it right now), pocky (just finished eating), and hair bleach (which I have in my hair right now). I'm hoping that the hair bleach will work. My natural hair color is black/really really DARK DARK brown and it normally comes out orange. !><! 

Todays been pretty good though. Had Burger King w Kar...interesting...VERY INTERESTING.

So, I'm lounging at my computer desk with boxers and combat boots on and I feel like I'm stuck in a damn time warp. My "hometown" is something out of those lame Leave it to Beaver kind of thing. Everyone knows each other, is related to someone in someway, or dating someone who is related to someone who is related to someone..so on and so forth.

I was walking down the street the other and someone stopped me and asked "Aren't you Cheryl D's kid?" It's like...WTF. Does fucking everyone know who the hell I am? Nothing changes around here. Once in a great while someone will move out and someone semi-new will move it. I can't wait till I can afford to live elsewhere. Like Boston...or San Francisco. 

I haven't gotten drunk in over a week. I have no more smokes and can't get any till tomorrow when my check clears. On top of that, I have to dress up to go to a damn interview for a job. 

Maybe it's just me...I don't know. But how can someone crave for a small town kind of life? I guess it's like when you crave a big city kind of life. It's there...a longing deep inside only you know. I'm taking a shot in the dark. 

My mom grew up here in Rumersdale. She says she kinda likes it. This place isn't one of those "I kinda." It's more of a "I hate it" or "I like it." 

What my grandparents saw in this place when they settle here over 70 years ago...I don't know. Maybe it seemed different back then. Maybe they wanted the "quiet life" for their kids and grandkids as time went on. Personally, I kinda wish they stayed in North Providence. 

So, is it tomorrow yet? Can I buy my smokes yet?

If you could be another person for a day, who would it be and why?

Hmmm...I would love to be George W. Bush for a day. I wanna know what the fuck goes throw his mind. If anything goes throw that pea sized noodle.

Or perhaps I would be a bird. So I can fly anywhere I wanted in the world. Like...San Francisco, California.

Hey! Alright. So...I'm going to be working at Shaws starting next Tuesday. Buuuut. I'm only going to be making 7.50 an hour and working 20 hours a week. I'll need to find a better paying job after a few months. Some advice would be nice. (And no Nat...no moving to Chicago.)
